hero_description: Full-stack web developer with experience in JavaScript, React, SQL, and Node.js. Passionate about creating efficient and scalable web applications. I stand out for my ability to work in a team, my attention to detail, and my commitment to continuous learning. I seek to join a dynamic team where I can contribute with my technical skills and grow professionally.

back_end_tutor_resp3: Promoting collaboration through pair programming and group activities.

freelance_description: Working as a Freelance Developer on various projects.
